name: Two Cakes
description:
Just you, a Han-some archer, and a tired narrator that will happily stay out of your way as long as you're reasonable in your decisions on this date/not-date.

And cake.  

Of course, there has to be cake.

---

Project made for fun only (please be nice, I've never made a game before).

*Images will be pixelated for a moment the first time they load in game.

Cursing is minimally present - Would consider it more of a T-rating because of a few sexually-leaning jokes.

Slight TW for topics such as discussion/mention of death, killing, blood.  No detailed descriptions, no gore.

Tips:

*There is a font option for a dyslexia-friendly font - just look in the preferences page!
***IF YOU USE THIS FONT INSTEAD OF THE DEFAULT, YOU WILL NEED TO PRESS THE "A" KEY TO OPEN THE ACCESSIBILITY MENU ONCE STARTING THE GAME AND MANUALLY REDUCE THE FONT SIZE, OTHERWISE A LOT OF THE TEXT WILL BE CUT OFF.

*There are four stickers/easter eggs included to be found when exploring different options - can you find them all?

*There are "Bad endings"/fake endings which will take you back to the main screen,    so I recommend saving every now and then.

Have fun! <3
